plan:
Welcome to Kathmandu - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clouds weather and temperatures around 24°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Kathmandu has to offer.
            
            Your $10000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Kathmandu truly special. 
            
            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

activities: Morning: Arrive in Kathmandu, check-in, and explore the city center
Afternoon: Walking tour of Kathmandu's main attractions
Evening: Welcome dinner at a traditional restaurant in Kathmandu
Morning: Visit Kathmandu's main museums and cultural sites
Afternoon: Explore traditional neighborhoods in Kathmandu
Evening: Traditional cultural show or performance in Kathmandu
Morning: Early morning hike or nature walk in Kathmandu
Afternoon: Outdoor adventure activities around Kathmandu
Evening: Sunset viewing and evening nature activities in Kathmandu

Afternoon: Hands-on cultural workshop in Kathmandu
Evening: Evening with local families or community events in Kathmandu
Morning: Discover lesser-known attractions in Kathmandu
Afternoon: Visit off-the-beaten-path locations in Kathmandu

Afternoon: Leisure time at parks or wellness centers in Kathmandu
Evening: Evening relaxation and wellness activities in Kathmandu
Morning: Explore traditional markets and local crafts in Kathmandu
Afternoon: Shopping districts and local boutiques in Kathmandu
Evening: Night markets and evening shopping in Kathmandu
Morning: Tour historical landmarks and monuments in Kathmandu
Afternoon: Deep dive into Kathmandu's historical sites
Evening: Evening historical walking tour in Kathmandu

Try local cuisine and specialties
Learn basic local phrases
Respect local customs and traditions

plan:
Welcome to Tokyo - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clear weather and temperatures around 15°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Tokyo has to offer.
            
            Your $10000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Tokyo truly special. 
            
            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

activities: Morning: Private guided tour of Senso-ji Temple in Asakusa, exploring Nakamise Shopping Street for traditional snacks and souvenirs (2 hours). Cost: $150 for guide
Afternoon: Luxury shopping at Ginza Six with premium boutiques, followed by tea at Salon de Thé Rond at Chanel Ginza. Cost: Shopping variable, tea $60
Evening: Michelin-starred sushi experience at Sukiyabashi Jiro Roppongi with omakase course. Cost: $800 for two with sake pairing
Morning: Private helicopter tour over Tokyo Skyline including views of Mount Fuji (weather permitting). Cost: $1200 for private charter
Afternoon: Cultural immersion at Meiji Shrine and traditional tea ceremony experience at Happo-en Garden. Cost: $200 for private ceremony
Evening: Exclusive cocktail experience at The Bellwood in Shibuya followed by omakase dinner at Narisawa. Cost: Cocktails $120, dinner $600
Morning: Private car transfer to Mount Takao for guided hiking adventure through ancient trails and cable car descent. Cost: $300 including guide and transfers
Afternoon: Traditional kaiseki lunch at Takao Sanroku Restaurant followed by onsen experience at Keio Takaosan Onsen Gokurakuyu. Cost: Lunch $200, onsen $80
Evening: Private photography tour of Shinjuku's neon district with professional photographer guide. Cost: $400 including equipment
Morning: Luxury shopping experience at Omotesando Hills and Cat Street with personal shopper. Cost: $300 for shopper service
Afternoon: Private sushi-making class with master chef at Tsukiji Outer Market followed by market exploration. Cost: $350 including ingredients
Evening: Exclusive nightlife experience with VIP access to clubs in Roppongi including cover and bottle service. Cost: $600
Morning: Private wellness retreat at Aman Tokyo Spa with traditional Japanese treatments and infinity pool access. Cost: $500 for couples package
Afternoon: Final luxury shopping at Tokyo Midtown and traditional lunch at Kozue restaurant with panoramic city views. Cost: Lunch $250
Evening: Farewell dinner helicopter tour over Tokyo night lights with champagne service. Cost: $1500 including gourmet bento
recommendations: Book all premium experiences 2-3 months in advance
Carry cash for traditional markets and smaller establishments
Respect temple and shrine etiquette by washing hands and bowing before entering
Consider purchasing a Suica card for convenient transportation between luxury destinations
Make restaurant reservations through your hotel concierge for best access to exclusive venues

daily_plan.afternoon: Luxury shopping at Ginza Six with premium boutiques, followed by tea at Salon de Thé Rond at Chanel Ginza. Cost: Shopping variable, tea $60
daily_plan.evening: Michelin-starred sushi experience at Sukiyabashi Jiro Roppongi with omakase course. Cost: $800 for two with sake pairing

daily_plan.morning: Private helicopter tour over Tokyo Skyline including views of Mount Fuji (weather permitting). Cost: $1200 for private charter

daily_plan.evening: Exclusive cocktail experience at The Bellwood in Shibuya followed by omakase dinner at Narisawa. Cost: Cocktails $120, dinner $600

daily_plan.morning: Private car transfer to Mount Takao for guided hiking adventure through ancient trails and cable car descent. Cost: $300 including guide and transfers
daily_plan.afternoon: Traditional kaiseki lunch at Takao Sanroku Restaurant followed by onsen experience at Keio Takaosan Onsen Gokurakuyu. Cost: Lunch $200, onsen $80
daily_plan.evening: Private photography tour of Shinjuku's neon district with professional photographer guide. Cost: $400 including equipment

daily_plan.morning: Luxury shopping experience at Omotesando Hills and Cat Street with personal shopper. Cost: $300 for shopper service
daily_plan.afternoon: Private sushi-making class with master chef at Tsukiji Outer Market followed by market exploration. Cost: $350 including ingredients
daily_plan.evening: Exclusive nightlife experience with VIP access to clubs in Roppongi including cover and bottle service. Cost: $600

daily_plan.morning: Private wellness retreat at Aman Tokyo Spa with traditional Japanese treatments and infinity pool access. Cost: $500 for couples package
daily_plan.afternoon: Final luxury shopping at Tokyo Midtown and traditional lunch at Kozue restaurant with panoramic city views. Cost: Lunch $250

plan:
Welcome to Dharan - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clouds weather and temperatures around 22°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Dharan has to offer.
            
            Your $20000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Dharan truly special. 
            
            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

activities: Morning: Private guided tour of Dharan Clock Tower and surrounding local markets with cultural immersion experience at Rs 1,000 per person
Afternoon: Luxury spa treatments and wellness session at The Fern - An Ecotel Hotel's premium spa ($75 per person), followed by gourmet lunch at their fine dining restaurant ($40 per person)
Evening: Private traditional Nepali thali dinner with live cultural performances at a curated local venue with personal chef experience ($120 per couple)
Morning: Adventure trek to Dharan View Tower with private guide and photographer ($150 for guide and photography service), enjoying panoramic views of Himalayas
Afternoon: Exclusive cooking class with master Nepali chef focusing on local Khas cuisine at luxury resort ($180 per couple), including premium ingredients and wine pairing
Evening: Private sunset cocktail experience at elevated viewpoint with personal bartender and gourmet canapés ($200 per couple)
Morning: Helicopter tour to nearby Himalayan foothills with champagne breakfast landing ($2,000 per couple for private charter)
Afternoon: Luxury shopping experience with personal shopper at Dharan's premium handicraft stores and jewelry boutiques ($500 shopping budget)
Evening: Five-course gourmet dinner at The Fern's signature restaurant with wine pairing ($250 per couple)
Morning: Private yoga and meditation session with renowned local guru at scenic outdoor location ($120 per couple), followed by organic breakfast
Afternoon: Exclusive nature walk through nearby tea gardens with naturalist guide ($100 per couple), including premium tea tasting experience
Evening: Luxury nightlife experience with private DJ and cocktails at premium lounge ($300 per couple for exclusive booking)
Morning: Photography tour to local villages and temples with professional photographer guide ($200 per couple), capturing authentic cultural moments
Afternoon: Private traditional Nepali feast preparation with local family experience ($150 per couple), including hands-on cooking and cultural exchange
Evening: Farewell luxury dinner at mountain-view restaurant with personalized menu and live traditional music ($180 per couple)
recommendations: Hire private car with driver for entire stay ($100/day)
Book all premium experiences in advance through luxury concierge
Carry local currency for artisan purchases
Respect local customs during temple visits
Dress modestly for cultural sites
Try local delicacies like momos and thukpa
Bargain politely at local markets
Stay hydrated at higher altitudes

daily_plan.afternoon: Luxury spa treatments and wellness session at The Fern - An Ecotel Hotel's premium spa ($75 per person), followed by gourmet lunch at their fine dining restaurant ($40 per person)
daily_plan.evening: Private traditional Nepali thali dinner with live cultural performances at a curated local venue with personal chef experience ($120 per couple)

plan:
Welcome to Paris - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clear weather and temperatures around 15°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Paris has to offer.
            
            Your $2000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Paris truly special. 
            
            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

activities: Morning: Visit Louvre Museum (9 AM - 12 PM) - Explore masterpieces including Mona Lisa and Venus de Milo. Cost: $38 per person for timed entry tickets
Afternoon: Stroll through Tuileries Garden and visit Musée de l'Orangerie (1 PM - 5 PM) - Admire Monet's Water Lilies. Cost: $15 per person. Take Metro Line 1 between locations
Evening: Dinner at Le Comptoir du Relais in Saint-Germain (6 PM - 9 PM) - Classic French bistro experience. Cost: $120 for two with wine. Walk along Seine River afterward
Morning: Climb Eiffel Tower (9 AM - 12 PM) - Summit access with panoramic views. Cost: $53 per person. Arrive early to avoid crowds
Afternoon: Seine River Cruise and visit Musée d'Orsay (1 PM - 5 PM) - 1-hour boat tour $22 per person, museum $19 per person. Take Batobus between stops
Evening: Dinner at Les Ombres restaurant with Eiffel Tower views (6 PM - 9 PM) - Modern French cuisine. Cost: $180 for two. Watch tower sparkle at top of the hour
Morning: Explore Montmartre and Sacré-Cœur Basilica (9 AM - 12 PM) - Free basilica entry, $12 for dome climb. Ride funicular to save energy
Afternoon: Visit Centre Pompidou and Marais district walking tour (1 PM - 5 PM) - Museum $18 per person. Explore historic Jewish quarter and vintage shops
Evening: Farewell dinner at Bouillon Chartier (6 PM - 9 PM) - Historic Parisian brasserie since 1896. Cost: $70 for two. Final stroll through illuminated streets
recommendations: Purchase Paris Museum Pass if visiting multiple museums
Learn basic French phrases like 'bonjour' and 'merci'
Comfortable walking shoes essential for cobblestone streets
Make dinner reservations in advance for popular restaurants
Validate metro tickets before boarding to avoid fines

daily_plan.morning: Visit Louvre Museum (9 AM - 12 PM) - Explore masterpieces including Mona Lisa and Venus de Milo. Cost: $38 per person for timed entry tickets
daily_plan.afternoon: Stroll through Tuileries Garden and visit Musée de l'Orangerie (1 PM - 5 PM) - Admire Monet's Water Lilies. Cost: $15 per person. Take Metro Line 1 between locations
daily_plan.evening: Dinner at Le Comptoir du Relais in Saint-Germain (6 PM - 9 PM) - Classic French bistro experience. Cost: $120 for two with wine. Walk along Seine River afterward
daily_plan.cultural_tips: Book Louvre tickets online to skip lines. French meals are leisurely - expect dinner to take 2+ hours. Dress smart-casual for nicer restaurants

daily_plan.morning: Climb Eiffel Tower (9 AM - 12 PM) - Summit access with panoramic views. Cost: $53 per person. Arrive early to avoid crowds
daily_plan.afternoon: Seine River Cruise and visit Musée d'Orsay (1 PM - 5 PM) - 1-hour boat tour $22 per person, museum $19 per person. Take Batobus between stops
daily_plan.evening: Dinner at Les Ombres restaurant with Eiffel Tower views (6 PM - 9 PM) - Modern French cuisine. Cost: $180 for two. Watch tower sparkle at top of the hour
daily_plan.cultural_tips: Eiffel Tower summit tickets sell out quickly - book weeks in advance. Museum d'Orsay houses magnificent Impressionist collection in beautiful former railway station

daily_plan.morning: Explore Montmartre and Sacré-Cœur Basilica (9 AM - 12 PM) - Free basilica entry, $12 for dome climb. Ride funicular to save energy
daily_plan.afternoon: Visit Centre Pompidou and Marais district walking tour (1 PM - 5 PM) - Museum $18 per person. Explore historic Jewish quarter and vintage shops
daily_plan.evening: Farewell dinner at Bouillon Chartier (6 PM - 9 PM) - Historic Parisian brasserie since 1896. Cost: $70 for two. Final stroll through illuminated streets
daily_plan.cultural_tips: Montmartre artists may offer quick portraits - negotiate price first. Bouillon Chartier maintains traditional French service - cash preferred. Save metro tickets as they're valid for transfers within 2 hours

summary.trip_overview:
Welcome to Paris - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clear weather and temperatures around 15°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Paris has to offer.
            
            Your $2000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Paris truly special.

            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

Check visa requirements
Get travel insurance

plan:
Welcome to Kathmandu - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clouds weather and temperatures around 19°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Kathmandu has to offer.
            
            Your $10000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Kathmandu truly special. 
            
            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

activities: Morning: Private guided tour of Swayambhunath Temple (Monkey Temple) with photography session of panoramic Kathmandu Valley views. Includes traditional prayer flag ceremony and monk blessing
Afternoon: Luxury lunch at Dwarika's Hotel followed by exclusive guided tour of Patan Durbar Square with access to preserved ancient courtyards and artisan workshops
Evening: Sunset cocktails at The Old House rooftop followed by 7-course Nepali tasting menu at Bhojan Griha with live cultural performances
Morning: Private helicopter flight to Nagarkot for sunrise photography over Himalayan range (Annapurna, Manaslu, Everest visibility permitting) with champagne breakfast at Club Himalaya
Afternoon: Return to Kathmandu for private Ayurvedic spa treatment at Dwarika's Resort including traditional massage and herbal therapies
Evening: Exclusive cooking class and dinner at Nepali Chulo learning to prepare authentic Newari cuisine with master chefs
Morning: Private guided hike through Shivapuri National Park with naturalist guide for bird watching and mountain photography. Includes gourmet picnic breakfast
Afternoon: Visit to Boudhanath Stupa with private meditation session with resident monks and traditional thangka painting workshop
Evening: Fine dining experience at Kaiser Café in Garden of Dreams followed by private classical music performance
Morning: Scenic helicopter flight to Pokhara with aerial photography of Himalayan peaks. Private transfer to Temple Tree Resort
Afternoon: Luxury boating on Phewa Lake with professional photographer guide. Visit to Tal Barahi Temple and lakeside exploration
Evening: Private candlelit dinner at The French Restaurant with Annapurna mountain views and wine pairing
Morning: Sunrise paragliding adventure from Sarangkot with professional pilots and photography package. Includes champagne celebration landing
Afternoon: Private wellness retreat at Atmaya Spa with Himalayan salt therapy and hot stone massage. Lunch at The Harbor Restaurant
Evening: Cultural evening at Tibetan Refugee Camp with private guided tour and traditional dinner with local family
Morning: Helicopter return to Kathmandu with aerial tour of Gosaikunda lakes. Final shopping at Babar Mahal Revisited luxury boutiques
Afternoon: Private farewell lunch at Chez Caroline with French-Nepali fusion cuisine. Last-minute cultural souvenir shopping
Evening: Sunset farewell cocktails at Hyatt Regency rooftop bar with panoramic city views and personalized photo book presentation of the trip
recommendations: Book helicopter tours in advance through reputable operators
Carry local currency for artisan purchases and tips
Respect temple customs - remove shoes and dress modestly
Hire private car with driver for all transportation (approx $100/day)
Acquire necessary permits for photography in religious sites
Stay hydrated and allow for altitude adjustment
Purchase travel insurance covering adventure activities

daily_plan.afternoon: Luxury lunch at Dwarika's Hotel followed by exclusive guided tour of Patan Durbar Square with access to preserved ancient courtyards and artisan workshops
daily_plan.evening: Sunset cocktails at The Old House rooftop followed by 7-course Nepali tasting menu at Bhojan Griha with live cultural performances
